name: Columns Reordering For Elementor
author: WP Clevel

sections.description:
This plugin adds “Display Order” control to help you easily reorder Elementor columns, sections and widgets responsively. No need to duplicate things!

How To Use

Just click on the column or section you want to reorder. There will be a “Display Order” control on the “Layout” tab which allows you to reorder that column or section responsively.

Getting Started

Requirements

  • WordPress 5.2 or greater
  • Elementor Page Builder 2.8.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater (PHP 7.4 or greater is recommended)
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater (MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended)

Automatic installation

To do an automatic install of this plugin, log in to your WordPress admin dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field, type “column reordering elementor” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found this plugin, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin requires Elementor Pro version?

No, this plugin is for both Free and Pro version.

How can i get support?

Feel free to create a ticket at plugin’s support section.

How can i contribute?

Please check out development section!
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.0 – August 20, 2020

  • Initial release.

Version 1.0.1 – December 14, 2021

  • Fixes for Elementor v3.5.0 update.

Version 1.0.2 – Febuary 10, 2022

  • Add support for reordering Widgets.
